Helen von Tilzer1

Last Edited=5 Nov 2007

Helen von Tilzer married Milton Marx, son of Sam Marx and Minnie Schoenberg, in 1929.1

From 1929, her married name became Marx.1

Gregg Marx1

M, #249624, b. 3 April 1955

Last Edited=5 Nov 2007

Gregg Marx was born on 3 April 1955 at Hollywood, California, U.S.A. .1 He is the son of Bob Marx.1

He was an actor.1

Herbert Marx1

M, #249627, b. 25 November 1901, d. 29 November 1979

Last Edited=5 Nov 2007

Herbert Marx was born on 25 November 1901 at New York City, New York, U.S.A. .1 He was the son of Sam Marx and Minnie Schoenberg.1 He married, firstly, Marion Benda in 1927.1 He and Marion Benda were divorced on 12 May 1954.1 He married, secondly, Barbara Blakeley in 1959.1 He and Barbara Blakeley were divorced between 1972 and 1973.1 He died on 29 November 1979 at age 78 at Palm Springs, California, U.S.A. .1

Herbert Marx used the stage-name of Zeppo.1 He and Bobby Oliver Marx were adopted.1 He was an actor, comedian and theatrical agent.1 He adopted Timothy Marx in 1944.1

Child of Herbert Marx and Marion Benda

Timothy Marx1 b. 1921

Citations

[S130] Wikipedia, online http;//www.wikipedia.org. Hereinafter cited as Wikipedia.

Marion Benda1

F, #249628

Last Edited=5 Nov 2007

Marion Benda married Herbert Marx, son of Sam Marx and Minnie Schoenberg, in 1927.1 She and Herbert Marx were divorced on 12 May 1954.1

From 1927, her married name became Marx.1 She adopted Timothy Marx in 1944.1

Child of Marion Benda and Herbert Marx

Barbara Blakeley1

F, #249629

Last Edited=20 Nov 2007

Barbara Blakeley married, firstly, Herbert Marx, son of Sam Marx and Minnie Schoenberg, in 1959.1 She and Herbert Marx were divorced between 1972 and 1973.1 She married, secondly, Francis Albert Sinatra, son of Anthony Martin Sinatra and Natalie Dolly Garaventa, in July 1976.1

From 1959, her married name became Marx.1 From July 1976, her married name became Sinatra.1

Child of Barbara Blakeley

Bobby Oliver Marx1
